text: Walkelin de Ferrers may refer to: *Walchelin de Ferriers, 12th century lord of Oakham Castle *Walkelin de Derby, 12th century lord of Egginton, Derbyshire *Walkeline de Ferrers (d.c. 1040), 11th century Seigneur of Ferrières-Saint- Hilaire and father of Henry de Ferrers
title: Walkelin de Ferrers
